name: Lucky Penny
description:
Save as many coins as possible while avoiding the roaches. Live the life a lucky penny saving his fellow coin brethren!
Made for 2019 Marketplace Takeover #ue4jam
 
Team Name
Malum Games Studio

Gameplay Instructions
Use the bottom left jump button to jump over roaches, or swipe to move the coin from lane to lane to avoid them, while collecting the coins.
The farther you get, the higher your score. Save as many coins as possible!

All content in this game was made and is owned by this team.

Team
Justin - Art
Robert - Development
Randol - Design
Kelsey - Design
Gabriel - Sound
